mapper.select: select count(*) from canceled_order where order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: insert into canceled_order (order_id, product_id, option_size, option_frame, canceled_order_category, canceled_order_reason, canceled_order_req_date) values(#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{optionSize}, #{optionFrame}, #{canceledOrderCategory}, #{canceledOrderReason, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{canceledOrderReqDate})
mapper.update: update canceled_order set canceled_order_cmptn_date = #{date} where order_id=#{orderId} and product_id=#{productId}
